law.catch_line: Services required to be included in coverage for assisted living benefits and for adult day care services.

text.section:
Any long-term care policy, issued on or after June 21, 2001, which provides coverage for assisted living benefits shall cover services received in any assisted living community which:
Meets the requirements of KRS 194A.700 to 194A.729 and any administrative regulations promulgated under KRS 194A.700 to 194A.729; and
Meets any additional requirements of an assisted living community set forth in the long-term care policy approved by the commissioner.

Any long-term care policy, issued on or after June 21, 2001, which provides coverage for adult day care services shall cover services received in any adult day care facility which:
Meets the requirements of KRS 205.950 or 216B.0443 and any administrative regulations promulgated under KRS 205.950 or 216B.0443; and
Meets any additional requirements of an adult day care center set forth in the long-term care policy approved by the commissioner.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1166, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 145, sec. 1, effective June 21, 2001.
